name: PyroDwarf
description:
Enforce your fiery ways upon an unsuspecting mystical forest! Burn and cause carnage to those around you! Burn the trees to fill your Heat O' Meter, and use your enemies as fuel!

Beware however, for there are tales of an Ent Lord that would not take such an aggressive action lightly.

Controls

Movement - WASD

Flamethrower - Left Mouse Button

Chainsaw - Right Mouse Button

Collect chopped up body parts for fuel - E (Hold)

Music (Alexander Nakarada) - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iPZDG0WqqYU
